mapper.insert: insert into likes (uid, pid, status) values (#{uid}, #{pid}, #{status})
mapper.select: select p.uid uid, count(*) cnt from post p join likes l on p.id = l.pid where l.status = 1 group by p.uid
select p.did did, count(*) cnt from post p join likes l on p.id = l.pid where l.status = 1 group by p.did
